meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mischievous.
meanings.sent1: Her mischievousnesses often led to pranks and jokes among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The children's mischievousnesses during recess sometimes caused the teacher to intervene.
meanings.sent3: The mischievousnesses of the puppy chasing its tail brought laughter to the family.
meanings.sent4: The mischievousnesses of the wind playing with the leaves made the trees dance.
meanings.sent5: The mischievousnesses of the squirrel stealing nuts made it the talk of the forest.

meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that are playful or causing minor harm or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: The mischievousnesses of the kitten knocking over the vase amused the family.
meanings.sent2: His mischievousnesses in class often resulted in detention.
meanings.sent3: The mischievousnesses of the raccoon stealing food from the campsite caused a stir.
meanings.sent4: The mischievousnesses of the waves splashing on the shore created a playful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The mischievousnesses of the shadows dancing in the moonlight added a mysterious touch to the night.
